verses.verse: לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> for the sons קֹ֭רַח <WH7141> of Korah מִזְמ֣וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm שִׁ֑יר <WH7892> [or] Song יְ֝סוּדָת֗וֹ <WH3248> His foundation בְּהַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> mountains קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> [is] in the holy

אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> loveth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> the gates צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> of Zion מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> all מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת <WH4908> more than all the dwellings יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob
נִ֭כְבָּדוֹת <WH3513> Glorious things מְדֻבָּ֣ר <WH1696> are spoken בָּ֑ךְ עִ֖יר <WH5892> of thee O city הָאֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> of God סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

אַזְכִּ֤יר ׀ <WH2142> I will make mention רַ֥הַב <WH7294> of Rahab וּבָבֶ֗ל <WH894> and Babylon לְֽיֹ֫דְעָ֥י <WH3045> to them that know הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold פְלֶ֣שֶׁת <WH6429> me behold Philistia וְצ֣וֹר <WH6865> and Tyre עִם־ <WH5973> with כּ֑וּשׁ <WH3568> with Ethiopia זֶ֝֗ה <WH2088> This יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> this [man] was born שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> But

וּֽלֲצִיּ֨וֹן ׀ <WH6726> And of Zion יֵאָמַ֗ר <WH559> it shall be said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> This and that man וְ֭אִישׁ <WH376> one יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> was born בָּ֑הּ וְה֖וּא <WH1931> Himself יְכוֹנְנֶ֣הָ <WH3559> himself shall establish עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> in her and the highest

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD יִ֭סְפֹּר <WH5608> shall count בִּכְת֣וֹב <WH3789> when he writeth up עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> the people זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> [that] this [man] was born שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> there Selah
וְשָׁרִ֥ים <WH7891> As well the singers כְּחֹלְלִ֑ים <WH2490> as the players כָּֽל־ <WH3605> All מַעְיָנַ֥י <WH4599> on instruments [shall be there] all my springs בָּֽךְ׃
